events.description: A mesmerizing journey with a musical guest, bringing soulful melodies and captivating rhythms to life on stage.

events.title: TinyVerse
events.description: Unleash your inner artist! Join our miniature modeling event. We provide all the materials: clay, paints, glitter, and more! Create your own masterpiece or follow along with club members' guidance. All creations are yours to keep!

events.title: Pitch Perfect - Eastern
events.description: An eastern solo singing contest and put your vocal range and pitch knowledge to the ultimate test!

events.title: Lagori 2.0 (Seven stones)
events.description: Lagori is a traditional game from the Indian subcontinent involving a ball and a pile of flat stones, generally played between two teams in a large outdoor area.

events.title: Traditions in Tunes
events.description: Traditions in Tune: A vibrant celebration of Indian culture, headlined by a stunning fashion show blending tradition and style!

events.title: VGL FIFA
events.description: The FIFA tournament is an electrifying competitive event where players showcase their mastery of virtual football in intense, head-to-head matches. Participants must employ strategic gameplay, precise control, and a deep understanding of tactics to outmaneuver their opponents. With every goal, pass, and tackle, players strive to dominate the pitch and claim ultimate victory.

events.title: Grill or Get Grilled
events.description: an exciting debate competition where wit meets words! Gather your team, sharpen your arguments, and enter a friendly, competitive environment that celebrates healthy discourse and collaboration.

events.title: SMRITI ’25 – Pratidhwani (Creative Speaking)
events.description: Speak with passion, express with clarity—showcase your talent in Malayalam creative speaking.

events.title: Shilpkaar x Claytopia
events.club: VIT LEO CLUB x SPIC MACAY VIT
events.description: Claytopia is an engaging pottery event with two expert trainers, two pottery wheels, and quality materials. Participants can craft small objects on the wheel for them to take back.  They can also explore creativity by moulding clay into small, unique objects.

events.title: Scavenger of the Year 3.0
events.description: A high-stakes scavenger hunt like never before! Solve challenging riddles, race to key locations, and power up in game centers to gain an edge. Use your game center attempts wisely—attack or defend, the choice is yours! Only the smartest, fastest, and most strategic team will rise to the top and claim victory!
tags: Treasure hunt, puzzle, Thrill Games, Physically exerting events

events.title: Cultural Rhythms
events.description: Staged in front of the SMV Portico, Cultural Rhythms spreads awareness about our social work, promotes fundraising through our stall, and showcases our dedication to helping underprivileged children.

events.title: Squid Game
events.description: The game ""Squid Game"" involves six rounds of competitive tasks where teams face unique challenges like quick naming, emoji decoding, drawing charades, absurd responses, guessing famous personalities, and showcasing talents under specific conditions. Teams earn points based on creativity, speed, and accuracy across the rounds, with penalties for cheating or irrelevant responses.
tags: Thrill Games, puzzle, Speaking, Art & Craft

events.title: Smash Room
events.description: Step into the Rage Room, a space to shatter stress and unleash your inner rage! Alone or with up to 5 friends, gear up, grab tools, and break your way to pure relief. Smash, shatter, and let go—your ultimate stress escape awaits!
tags: Thrill Games, Physically exerting events, Macho games

events.title: Music Production Masterclass
events.description: Join us on a hands-on workshop with some of the best producers and mixers in town, about the basics of production, mixing and work on a sample track by yourself.

events.description: This event is an exact replica of the reality show big boss

events.title: Mobwars

events.description: ""Survey says… it’s time to team up, guess smart, and fight for cash, laughs, and ultimate bragging rights!""

events.title: Bollywood Bash 3.0
events.description:
Step into the vibrant world of Indian cinema at the Bollywood Bash! This high-energy event promises hours of fun and excitement as you celebrate the magic of Bollywood.  
Dress as your favorite Bollywood character—whether it's a legendary star from the golden era or a modern-day icon—and bring their charm and style to life. The event will feature electrifying Bollywood music, creating the perfect setting for dancing to iconic moves or freestyling to your heart’s content.  
With colorful costumes, lively beats, and an atmosphere buzzing with energy, the *Bollywood Bash* is your chance to embrace the glamour, drama, and joy of Bollywood. Don’t miss out on this unforgettable celebration! ✨

events.title: La Fiesta Carnival 2.0
events.description: La Fiesta Carnival is a vibrant community event featuring fun games, live performances, and interactive activities for all ages. With themed decorations and exciting prizes, it promises a festive celebration of unity, joy, and diversity, welcoming everyone to join the fun.

events.title: IPL Auction
events.description: A simulated IPL-style sports auction where teams of 4 bid on players with skill points (1-10) within a fixed budget to build a balanced squad. The winning team is determined through a points-based evaluation, blending strategy, teamwork, and fun.

events.title: Chitram
events.description: Sahiti, the Telugu literary association, presents Chitram, a grand competitive event. The main event features performances by Sahiti Club members, followed by final competitive rounds showcasing top talents in dance, singing, and dialogue delivery from the prelims, judged by a distinguished guest and followed by a lively concert at the end.

events.title: Hogwarts' House Cup Chronicles
events.description: Join us for a ride through Hogwarts as we take on challenges like potion making, wand crafting and Quidditch.

events.title: Cashino 2.0

events.title: Student of the Year 3.0

events.title: Kalaa 2.0
events.description: Kalaa 2.0 is a cultural fest celebrating inclusivity and exceptional talent. This unique event features inspiring performances by blind school students, showcasing their extraordinary abilities, alongside the finest talent from VIT. Winners of the pre-event VIT Talent Show will take the main stage, and musical bands from VIT will energize the crowd with electrifying performances. A seamless fusion of diverse talents, Kalaa 2.0 is an opportunity to appreciate creativity, celebrate diversity, and enjoy an evening filled with memorable performances

events.title: Roadies:Thrillville Trials
events.description:
Roadies: Thrillville Trials is an electrifying event designed to push participants to their limits through a series of meticulously crafted challenges. This high-energy competition will test not only physical strength but also mental agility, strategic thinking, and unwavering resilience.
Whether it’s outmaneuvering opponents in high-stakes face-offs, solving complex puzzles under time constraints, or demonstrating the sheer willpower to push through exhaustion, Roadies: Thrillville Trials promises an unforgettable experience. Only those with the perfect blend of strength, intellect, and grit will emerge victorious. Do you have what it takes to conquer the ultimate test?
tags: Physically exerting events, Macho games, Thrill Games, TV show

Expect a dynamic atmosphere of energy and joviality as our guests connect with the audience, answering questions and encouraging meaningful conversations. It's an experience that will leave you motivated and ready to face any challenge ahead.

events.description: Gear up and unleash your inner warrior in an action-packed Paintball challenge! Strategize with your team, aim, and shoot your way to victory in this thrilling battle simulation. Get ready for an adrenaline rush like never before!

events.title: Battle It Out
events.description: A high energy one-on-one dance battle where skill, style, and creativity decide the champion.

events.title: Casinova 3.0: The Mystery Edition
events.description: Casinova 3.0: The Mystery Edition is a thrilling finance-themed escape room featuring challenges like Bear Pong, Angry Birds Knockout, puzzles, and the Split or Steal dilemma. Test your strategy, teamwork, and decision-making to unlock the vault of riches!

events.title: Shuffle the Board - Chess 960  Championship
events.description: Shuffle the Board"" is a thrilling Chess 960 tournament where strategy meets unpredictability, featuring 7 Swiss rounds and rapid 10+5 gameplay.

events.title: The Riviera India Quiz
events.description: Dive into India's rich heritage and vibrant present with questions on culture, history, and current affairs. Showcase your expertise and claim the title of India Quiz champion!

events.title: Monopoly
events.description: Join us for Monopoly, an exciting fusion of strategy and skill! Test your wits in thrilling board game matches and conquer challenging cube-solving puzzles to win big

events.title: Arm Wrestling 2.0
events.description: Engage in a thrilling showdown of upper body strength and mental fortitude. Challenge your peers and emerge as the arm wrestling champion.

events.title: The Riviera General Quiz
events.description: Test your knowledge across everything under the sun and beyond, from history and science to pop culture and current affairs. Prove your mettle as the ultimate quizmaster!

events.title: Shipwreck Showdown
events.club: SOCIETY FOR INDUSTRIAL AND APPLIED MATHEMATICS (SIAM-VIT)
events.description: A pirate themed event where teams play 5 different games that challenges their teamwork, strategy and skill.

events.title: Kalakriti
events.description: Kalakriti is an immersive acting workshop designed to hone creativity, expression, and performance skills through hands-on techniques and expert guidance.

events.title: VIT's Got Latent
events.club: MATRIX THE MULTIMEDIA CLUB & Odisha Literary Association
events.description:
""Step into the spotlight with VIT's Got Latent – Riviera's ultimate talent extravaganza! From electrifying comedy and soulful songs to captivating dramas and jaw-dropping art, the stage is set for you to shine. With hilarious external judges, thrilling audience voting, and a huge prize pool waiting to be claimed, this is your moment to dazzle the crowd and leave your mark. Join us for endless fun, unforgettable performances, and the glory of being crowned the ultimate star!
""

events.title: Spartans Grand Prix
events.description: Experience the Grand Prix remote control cars will be tackling an obstacle field race track
